summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly elevated. Monitor closely.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding pH-lowering agents to maintain optimal levels for tilapia (6.5-7.5).
Continue monitoring; ensure TDS remains within 300-500 ppm for optimal plant growth.
Maintain temperature between 24-30°C; consider cooling methods if temperatures rise further.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 328.01 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.422 / 23.56 / 28.56 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
